reviews.review_msg: Catherine is by far my favourite teacher at SFU! She's fun, she'll joke with you and she really helps you practice your french. She's kind of like the "Fun Aunt". She is frank, which in some teachers may be intimidating, but my experiences with her are all good and i take her advice to heart. A+
She is a good, dedicated teacher whi is passionate about her profession and life in general. She is very very understanding and kind, just stay on her good side. She is great!!
She's pretty easy and nice but kind of annoying to listen to.
